title: The minimum size of the mezzanine floor shall be as per requirement and convenience of owner
clause_text: The minimum size of the mezzanine floor shall be as per requirement and convenience of owner. The aggregate area of such mezzanine floor shall in no case exceed 50% of (1) carpet area of that room, shops, etc. Where loft is provided in the room, the mezzanine floor shall not be allowed. Note - Mezzanine floor area shall be counted towards FSI.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
